name: Artista - Midnight - Box Pressed ToroÂ
additionalNotes: Artista Series is a novel approach to blend- ing tobaccos, representing years of hard work, development and learning from failure and capitalizing on success to bring you their best work yet. Artista Midnight is our first premium full-bodied cigar. Featuring a dark Ecuadorian Habano wrapper. A Connecticut shade binder offers sweetness and the filler tobaccos from three countries impart an incredible flavor profile.
